title: Detox Smoothie Powder

cleaned_text: Cleanse with 100% superfood! Our Daily Detox Smoothie Powder is full of healthy foods loaded with antioxidants. And so easy to use: Just blend 1 Tbsp Smoothie Powder with 2 bananas and 1 cup orange juice to enjoy all of the cleansing properties of these clean, tasty ingredients. The mild flavor of the Spirulina blends beautifully with the umami of the Dulse and the brightness of the blueberries to make a satisfying and truly delicious addition to your health regime. - 4oz in a compostable 3-1/8" x 8-1/8" - 14 servings per container - Great source of Iodine, Vitamins A, B12 and K - USDA Certified Organic - Vegan, Raw, Paleo, Gluten Free, No Fillers Ingredients: Organic Dried Blueberry Powder, Organic Dulse, Organic
